paragraphs: =imperar=, _v. n._, to reign, to hold sway, =7=, 5.
=importar=, _v. n._, to import, to matter; to count, to be of consequence.
=incomodar=, _v. a._, to incommode, to put out, =63=, 28.
=indicar=, _v. a._, to indicate, to point out, to mention.
=infamia=, _f._, infamy, shame, dishonor; act of infamy, shameful deed, =69=, 18.
=infeliz=, =adj.=, unhappy; =la --=, =82=, 22, the unhappy woman, the poor thing, the poor creature.
=injuriar=, _v. a._, to wrong, to injure, to insult.
=inspirar=, _v. a._, to inspire, to cause (_dat. of person, acc. of thing_).
=interlocutor=, _m._, _used as adj._, =67=, 24, interlocutor, speaker, speaking, replying.
=interpelar=, _v. a._, to speak to, to address; _pp._, =60=, 13, person spoken to.
=interrogar=, _v. a. and n._, to ask, to inquire; to question, to interrogate.
=invocar=, _v. a._, to invoke, to call upon.

=ir=, _v. n._, to go; to be; to become; to go, to lead (_of a road_); to be at stake; to be, to feel (_of health_); to concern, to touch; =-- a=, to be about to, to be going to; =va de vencida=, =5=, 1, is almost over; =vamos a ver=, =2=, 9, let's see; =vamos a ver=, =98=, 22, let's see, we'll see; =¿cómo va de salud?= =62=, 12, how's your health, how are you?; =en ello me van=, I have at stake, there are at stake, =58=, 8; =es a lo que iba=, =48=, 23, this is what I was getting at; =¿qué tal vamos?=, =84=, 6, how are you, how are you feeling? =no va con usted=, =57=, 2, does not concern you; =fue a hablar=, =35=, 27, was going to speak, tried to speak; =fue a dar otro paso=, he was about to take another step; =iba en=, =67=, 23, was riding, was riding on; =¡vamos! ¡vamos!= =31=, 8, come, come! =vamos=, =58=, 10, come on, let's go; =no te vayas a caer=, =30=, 13, don't go and fall; =¡vaya!= come, nonsense, indeed, impossible; =vaya que tú=, =113=, 7, can it be that you, how about you; =¡vaya si me ahorcarían!= =74=, 20, wouldn't they just hang me! =vaya con Dios=, _expression of dismissal or leave taking_, =122=, 6, _etc._, farewell; =vaya mucho con Dios=, =98=, 12, go your way, go in peace; =--se=, _v. refl._, to go, to go away.
=jaraiz=, _m._, wine-press; pit for pressing grapes; _see note to_ =21=, 4.
=jarra=, _f._, two-handled jar or jug; =ponerse en --s=, =31=, 29, to put one's hands on one's hips, to put the arms akimbo.
=jugar=, _v. n._, to play (_games, etc._), =20=, 4; =¡no se juega conmigo!= you can't play with me, trifle with me, =89=, 21.
=juicio=, _m._, judgment, common-sense, "senses," =17=, 22, _etc._; =a mi --=, to my way of thinking, =113=, 17; =malos --s=, =124=, 8, evil judgments.
=juntamente=, _adv._, together; at once, at the same time, =27=, 3.
=jurisconsulto=, _m._, jurisconsult; man learned in the law; lawyer, =125=, 8.
=justificar=, _v. a._, to justify, to clear, to exculpate, =81=, 25, =113=, 19, 20, _etc._
=laborioso, sa=, _adj._, laborious, difficult; =20=, 16, painstaking, careful, patient.
=ladeado, da=, _adj._, crooked; bent to one side, on one side, =35=, 22.

=lanzar=, _v. a._, to throw, to cast; =103=, 20, to give vent to, to utter; to give, to let go, =67=, 12; =-- carcajadas=, =33=, 1, to burst into laughter; =--se=, _v. refl._, =79=, 31, =109=, 12, to rush, to spring.
=largo, ga=, _adj._, long; =tan -- como era=, =95=, 9, at full length.
=legítimo, ma=, _adj._, lawful, legitimate; justified, grounded, well-founded; genuine.
=lejos=, _adv._, far, afar; =a lo --=, =104=, 28, in the distance.
=letra=, _f._, letter; writing, hand-writing; _pl._, =--s=, =1=, 7, culture, letters, education; =al pie de la --=, =50=, 22, exactly, literally.
=levantar=, _v. a._, to raise, to lift; _v. refl._, =--se=, to rise, to get up; =estar levantada=, =119=, 3, to be up, to be dressed. [p. 208]
=liar=, _v. a._, to bind; =67=, 1, to roll (_a cigarette_.)
=libreja=, _f._ (_dim. of_ =libra=), little pound, pound or so, =54=, 4.
=libro=, _m._, book; =-- de Caballerías=, =6=, 5, Romance of Chivalry.
=licencia=, _f._, license, permission; =las --s necesarias=, _see note to_ =3=, 12; =tomarse -- absoluta=, =15=, 17, to obtain one's discharge (_of a soldier_).
=limitarse=, _v. refl._, to content oneself with, to stop with, =34=,
